body_html:
Efficiency issue could potentially be fixed by enabling XLA to fuse this pattern into a single op. That's better for maintainability than adding yet another native op (743 in the latest count)

/cc @hawkinsp in case he knows if that's close to being reality

Efficiency issue could potentially be fixed by enabling XLA to fuse this pattern into a single op. That's better for maintainability than adding yet another native op (743 in the latest count)
/cc @hawkinsp in case he knows if that's close to being reality
body:
Efficiency issue could potentially be fixed by enabling XLA to fuse this pattern into a single op. That's better for maintainability than adding yet another native op (743 in the latest [count](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/master/tensorflow/core/ops/ops.pbtxt))

/cc @hawkinsp in case he knows if that's close to being reality
